front.title: •Search And Destroy
front.gametext: Deploy on table. Biker scouts are forfeit +1. During every draw phase, unless opponent's character of destiny < 4 occupies a battleground site, opponent loses 1 Force. Effect canceled unless your characters of destiny < 4 occupy two battleground sites.
front.lore: Imperial troops searched the forests of Endor to flush the Rebels out.

pulledBy: You Cannot Hide Forever & Mobilization Points
